Cracking Instructions:
----------------------

1.) Install Unity3D 5.x Personal from the official website
   <a href=" http://unity3d.com/get-unity/download?ref=personal" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://unity3d.com/get-unity/download?ref=personal</a>

2.) Make sure Unity3D is closed before patching

3.) Run the crack as administrator or the patching may not
    work correctly
		
4.) Click "Browse For Exe" and select Unity.exe from the 
    folder you installed it to
		
5.) If you want a backup of the file then tick the 'Make Backup' 
    option
		
6.) Click 'Crack It' and allow it to patch the original file and
    create the additional license file
		
7.) Enjoy! The 'Asset Store' does work as well as XBox One, PS4, etc
    if you have the module(s)
